original_definition: 'permission provision log' means a timestamped record of when the permission for a an eligible party or final customer was granted, revoked, or terminated, including a permission identifier, and a party identifier;
generated_definition: 'permission provision log' means a log of all permissions granted or denied, including the date, time, and details of the permission requested, the user or entity requesting it, and the decision made.

Article\u00a02: ‘permission provision log’ means a timestamped record of when the permission for a aneligible party or final customer was granted, revoked, or terminated, including a permission identifier, and a party identifier;
